texto: Documentation QSP - 050 TSS retained for a minimum of five years. Identifiable and retrievable records will be maintained to furnish evidence of activities Records QSP - 055 QA affecting quality. Records will be retained for a minimum of five years. The requirements for storage, process and transportation of raw materials and QSP - 020 MGMT components are specified in //VSB\materials.doc. Resources All staff are required to have successfully completed training on the handling of the SOP - 810 HRS materials specified in the contract. No special infrastructure or work environment conditions apply. All quotations given and all customer specifications and orders received will be reviewed
